text: Ani asa prakare tumaca palanakarta tumaci nivada karela ani tumhala ghatana va mamalyaca khulasa (arthata svapnaphala) sanganyaci sikavana de'ila ani apali krpa-denagi tumhala purnatah pradana karila, ani yakubacya parivaralahi, jasi tyane yapurvi tumacya dona purvajanna arthata ibrahima ani isahakalahi bharapura krpa-denagi pradana keli. Nihsansaya tumaca palanakarta motha jnana balaganara ani hikamatasahi ahe
